demoNotice: These are demo assets using placeholder images. Replace with actual test industry marketing materials.

assets.title: Internal Event Invitation
assets.description: Invitation template for internal launch event

messages.title: Initial Launch Email
messages.content:
Subject: Get Ready for Our Exciting Product Launch!

Hello Team,

We are thrilled to announce the upcoming launch of our new product! It's a pivotal moment for us, and your participation is crucial.

Stay tuned for more details.

Best, 
[Your Name]

messages.title: Promotion Planning Brief
messages.content:
Subject: Time to Plan Our Promotion Strategy

Dear Team,

We need to align our promotion plans for the new product launch. Let's brainstorm ideas and set clear objectives.

Looking forward to your creative input.

Regards,
[Your Name]

messages.title: Event Invitation Template
messages.content:
Subject: Internal Launch Event Invitation

Hi Team,

You're invited to our exclusive internal launch event to mark this exciting milestone. Join us for an informative and engaging session.

Date: [Event Date]
Venue: [Location]

Best,
[Your Name]

messages.title: Feedback Request
messages.content:
Subject: We Value Your Feedback

Hello Team,

As we wrap up our launch, we'd love to hear your thoughts. Please fill out the feedback form to help us improve future launches.

Thank you for your dedication.

Best,
[Your Name]

messages.title: Team Recognition
messages.content:
Subject: Celebrating Our Success Together!

Dear Team,

Congratulations on a successful product launch! Your hard work and collaboration made this possible. Let's continue to innovate and achieve great things.

Cheers,
[Your Name]

guides.title: Launch Strategy Guide
guides.content:
# Launch Strategy Guide

This guide will help you plan the initial stages of the product launch, setting the foundation for a successful campaign.

guides.title: Promotion Planning Guide
guides.content:
# Promotion Planning Guide

This guide provides strategies for creating effective promotional materials and campaigns to boost product visibility.

guides.title: Internal Communication Guide
guides.content:
# Internal Communication Guide

Ensure seamless communication across teams with this comprehensive guide, designed to keep everyone informed and aligned.

guides.title: Feedback Analysis Guide
guides.content:
# Feedback Analysis Guide

Learn how to efficiently collect and analyze feedback to refine future launches and improve product performance.

guides.title: Team Acknowledgment Guide
guides.content:
# Team Acknowledgment Guide

Celebrate your team's success and keep motivation high with the strategies outlined in this guide.

journeySteps.title: Initiation
journeySteps.description: Begin planning and set initial goals for the product launch.

journeySteps.title: Promotion Planning
journeySteps.description: Develop marketing strategies and materials to boost awareness.

journeySteps.title: Internal Communication
journeySteps.description: Ensure all teams are aligned and informed ahead of the launch.

journeySteps.title: Post-Launch Analysis
journeySteps.description: Gather feedback and assess initial impact following the launch.

journeySteps.title: Team Acknowledgment
journeySteps.description: Celebrate launch success and recognize team contributions.
